game.title: The Last Hope
game.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world where humanity is on the brink of extinction, you play as Echo, a young survivor who embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the truth behind the catastrophic event that destroyed the planet.
game.beginning: Players start in a desolate wasteland, where they must navigate through treacherous terrain, fight against mutated creatures, and scavenge for supplies. As they progress, they will encounter other survivors who will join or betray them on their quest.
game.ending: The game's final confrontation takes place at the entrance of an underground bunker, where Echo discovers the truth about the catastrophe: a corrupt government experiment went horribly wrong, causing widespread destruction and mutation. With this knowledge, Echo must decide whether to escape the planet with a small group of survivors or stay behind to warn others.
